Title: LabJack U3 DIO interface Library, Homeseer and other interface.
Description: This project will contain the necessary classes etc to allow a user with minimal experience utilize the LabJack U3 DIO device. This is a low cost, high reliability ADIO interface via USB. See http://Labjack.com for hardware details. This project will build on the set of .net drivers supplied on the LabJack website. The extended libraries will be focused on providing a processing wrapper for the device making it easy to combine with various Home and Office automation applications. Included will be ASP.Net, and WinMobile5/6 interfaces for consumption of  sample home automation applications.

Project Description
This project will contain the necessary classes etc to allow a user with minimal experience utilize the LabJack U3 DIO device. This is a low cost, high reliability ADIO interface via USB. See http://Labjack.com for hardware details. This project will build on the set of .net drivers supplied on the LabJack website. The extended libraries will be focused on providing a processing wrapper for the device making it easy to combine with various Home and Office automation applications. Included will be ASP.Net, and WinMobile5/6 interfaces for consumption of sample home automation applications.
